subScenes.name: 问候咨询
subScenes.description: 学生向管理员礼貌打招呼并说明来意

qaPairs.speakerText: Hi there! I'm new here—could you help me out with the library rules?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 嗨！我是新生，能帮我讲讲图书馆规则吗？

responses.text: Of course! I'd be happy to help.
responses.text_cn: 当然可以，我很乐意帮忙。

responses.text: Sure thing! What do you need to know?

qaPairs.usageNote: 初次见面用礼貌请求句，避免直接问

subScenes.name: 借阅规则
subScenes.description: 询问图书借阅数量和期限

qaPairs.speakerText: How many books can I check out at once, and how long can I keep 'em?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我一次能借几本书？能借多久？

responses.text: You can borrow up to 10 books for 4 weeks.

qaPairs.usageNote: 用缩写和口语表达更自然，避免生硬书面语

subScenes.name: 电子资源
subScenes.description: 咨询如何访问数据库和电子期刊

qaPairs.speakerText: I can't get into the JSTOR database—do I need a special login?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我登不上JSTOR，需要特殊账号吗？

responses.text: Yep, use your student ID and campus password.
responses.text_cn: 对，用学号和校园密码登录。

responses.text: You need to log in via the library's website first.
responses.text_cn: 得先通过图书馆官网登录。

responses.text: Try the proxy link on the library homepage.
responses.text_cn: 试试图书馆主页的代理链接。

qaPairs.usageNote: 电子资源访问需明确步骤，避免模糊回答

subScenes.name: 讨论��预订
subScenes.description: 询问如何预订小组讨论室

qaPairs.speakerText: Can I book a study room for my group? How far ahead do I need to reserve?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我能预订小组讨论室吗？要提前多久订？

responses.text: You can book online up to a week in advance.
Just go to the library portal—book it like a flight!
responses.text_cn: 去图书馆官网，像订机票一样订！

responses.text: Same day’s okay, but book early.

qaPairs.usageNote: 预订类问题需强调操作平台和时效性

qaPairs.speakerText: So just to confirm—I can borrow 10 books, access JSTOR with my student login, and book rooms online?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我确认下：能借10本书，用学号登录JSTOR，还能在线订房间？

responses.text: Yep, that's right. Any other questions?
responses.text_cn: 对，没错，还有别的问题吗？

responses.text: All good. Have a great day!

qaPairs.usageNote: 结尾确认信息可避免误解，提升沟通效率
